name: Projet Aurore
description:
Projet Aurore is an indie fighting / plateform game, where you can compete against your friends in a fantasy role-play universe.

This is a Graduation project that we plan to update and continue soon.

Nyash Team :

Achille Pace - Developper :

Tom Mignotte - Developper :
